name: Hiking
description: Hiking is a popular outdoor activity enjoyed in natural landscapes such as forests, mountains, and national parks.

name: Walking
description: Walking is an accessible activity, often enjoyed in parks, cities, or along scenic routes for leisure or fitness.

name: Soccer
description: Soccer is the most popular sport worldwide, uniting people through playing informal matches and supporting teams.

name: Swimming
description: Swimming is a recreational and fitness activity, often enjoyed at beaches, pools, and rivers.

name: Dancing
description: Dancing is a cultural and social activity that brings people together at events, festivals, or informal gatherings.

name: Jogging
description: Jogging is a common fitness activity enjoyed in urban areas, parks, and along scenic paths.

name: Cricket
description: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game with deep cultural roots, often played in local fields or parks.

name: Ice Hockey
description: Ice Hockey is a fast-paced team sport played on ice, often during winter months in colder climates.

name: Table Tennis
description: Table Tennis, also known as ping pong, is a fast-paced indoor sport played with paddles and a small ball.

name: Muay Thai
description: Muay Thai is a traditional martial art and combat sport, widely practiced for fitness and competition.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is a team sport commonly played on public courts, in schools, and professional arenas.

name: Rugby
description: Rugby is a physical team sport played with an oval ball, known for its passionate fans and traditions.

name: Long Distance Running
description: Long-distance running is a popular endurance sport and fitness activity, often enjoyed in marathons and scenic routes.

name: Australian Rules Football
description: Australian Rules Football is a dynamic team sport unique to Australia, blending elements of soccer and rugby.

name: Sumo Wrestling
description: Sumo Wrestling is a traditional Japanese combat sport, deeply rooted in cultural and ritual practices.

name: Field Hockey
description: Field Hockey is a widely played team sport, involving skillful ball control with a stick on a grass or turf field.

name: Camel Racing
description: Camel Racing is a traditional cultural sport popular in desert regions, celebrating heritage and community.

name: Oil Wrestling
description: Oil Wrestling is a historic cultural sport involving skill and strength, with roots in traditional ceremonies.

name: Tejo
description: Tejo is a traditional sport combining skill and precision, often enjoyed in social gatherings and festivals.

name: Paleta Frontón
description: Paleta Frontón is a traditional racquet sport played in public spaces and sports facilities.
